00047 public class TCPtoI2P implements Runnable {

00049         private I2PSocket I2P;
00050         private NamedDB info,  database;
00051         private Socket sock;
00052         private I2PSocketManager socketManager;

00062         TCPtoI2P(I2PSocketManager i2p, Socket socket, NamedDB info, NamedDB database, AtomicBoolean lives) {
00063                 this.sock = socket;
00064                 this.info = info;
00065                 this.database = database;
00066                 this.socketManager = i2p;
00067                 this.lives = lives;
00068         }
00069 
00078         private static String lnRead(InputStream in) throws IOException {
00079                 String S;
00080                 int b;
00081                 char c;
00082 
00083                 S = new String();
00084 
00085                 while (true) {
00086                         b = in.read();
00087                         if (b == 13) {
00088                                 //skip CR
00089                                 continue;
00090                         }
00091                         if (b < 20 || b > 126) {
00092                                 // exit on anything not legal
00093                                 break;
00094                         }
00095                         c = (char) (b & 0x7f); // We only really give a fuck about ASCII
00096                         S = new String(S + c);
00097                 }
00098                 return S;
00099         }
00100 
00108         private void Emsg(String e, OutputStream out) throws IOException {
00109 // Debugging            System.out.println("ERROR TCPtoI2P: " + e);
00110                 out.write("ERROR ".concat(e).getBytes());
00111                 out.write(13);
00112                 out.write(10);
00113                 out.flush();
00114         }
00115 
00116 //      private void rlock() throws Exception {
00117         private void rlock() {
00118                 database.getReadLock();
00119                 info.getReadLock();
00120         }
00121 
00122 //      private void runlock() throws Exception {
00123         private void runlock() {
00124                 info.releaseReadLock();
00125                 database.releaseReadLock();
00126         }

00132         public void run() {
00133                 String line, input;
00134                 InputStream Iin = null;
00135                 OutputStream Iout = null;
00136                 InputStream in = null;
00137                 OutputStream out = null;
00138                 Thread t = null;
00139                 Thread q = null;
00140                 try {
00141                         try {
00142 
00143                                 in = sock.getInputStream();
00144                                 out = sock.getOutputStream();
00145                                 line = lnRead(in);
00146                                 input = line.toLowerCase();
00147                                 Destination dest = null;
00148                                 if (input.endsWith(".i2p.xyz")) {
00149                                         dest = I2PTunnel.destFromName(input);
00150                                         line = dest.toBase64();
00151                                 }
00152                                 dest = new Destination();
00153                                 dest.fromBase64(line);
00154 
00155                                 try {
00156                                         // get a client socket
00157                                         I2P = socketManager.connect(dest);
00158                                         I2P.setReadTimeout(0); // temp bugfix, this *SHOULD* be the default
00159                                         // make readers/writers
00160                                         Iin = I2P.getInputStream();
00161                                         Iout = I2P.getOutputStream();
00162                                         // setup to cross the streams
00163                                         TCPio conn_c = new TCPio(in, Iout, lives); // app -> I2P
00164                                         TCPio conn_a = new TCPio(Iin, out, lives); // I2P -> app
00165                                         t = new Thread(conn_c, Thread.currentThread().getName() + " TCPioA");
00166                                         q = new Thread(conn_a, Thread.currentThread().getName() + " TCPioB");
00167                                         // Fire!
00168                                         t.start();
00169                                         q.start();
00170                                         while (t.isAlive() && q.isAlive() && lives.get()) { // AND is used here to kill off the other thread
00171                                                 Thread.sleep(10); //sleep for 10 ms
00172                                         }
00173                                 } catch (I2PException e) {
00174                                         Emsg(e.toString(), out);
00175                                 } catch (ConnectException e) {
00176                                         Emsg(e.toString(), out);
00177                                 } catch (NoRouteToHostException e) {
00178                                         Emsg(e.toString(), out);
00179                                 }
00180 
00181                         } catch (InterruptedIOException e) {
00182                                 // We're breaking away.
00183                         } catch (InterruptedException e) {
00184                                 // ditto
00185                         } catch (IOException e) {
00186                                 try {
00187                                         Emsg(e.toString(), out);
00188                                 } catch (IOException ex) {
00189                                         // ditto
00190                                 }
00191                         } catch (DataFormatException e) {
00192                                 try {
00193                                         Emsg(e.toString(), out);
00194                                 } catch (IOException ex) {
00195                                         // ditto
00196                                 }
00197                         }
00198 
00199                 } finally {
00200                         try {
00201                                 t.interrupt();
00202                         } catch (Exception e) {
00203                         }
00204                         try {
00205                                 q.interrupt();
00206                         } catch (Exception e) {
00207                         }
00208                         try {
00209                                 in.close();
00210                         } catch (Exception e) {
00211                         }
00212                         try {
00213                                 out.close();
00214                         } catch (Exception e) {
00215                         }
00216                         try {
00217                                 Iin.close();
00218                         } catch (Exception e) {
00219                         }
00220                         try {
00221                                 Iout.close();
00222                         } catch (Exception e) {
00223                         }
00224                         try {
00225                                 // System.out.println("TCPtoI2P: Close I2P");
00226                                 I2P.close();
00227                         } catch (Exception e) {
00228                         }
00229 
00230                         try {
00231                                 // System.out.println("TCPtoI2P: Close sock");
00232                                 sock.close();
00233                         } catch (Exception e) {
00234                         }
00235                 }
00236         // System.out.println("TCPtoI2P: Done.");
00237         }
00238 }
